en.name: Needs and objectives
en.coverDescription: To give yourself every chance at getting the sale you need to do your homework. Make sure you know your customer and the product, know what you want to get out of the meeting, and know how to get the right information for the sale.

fr.name: Répondre aux besoins et objections des clients
fr.coverDescription: Pour vous donner toutes les chances d'obtenir la vente, vous devez faire vos devoirs. Assurez-vous de connaître votre client et le produit, de savoir ce que vous souhaitez retirer de la réunion et de savoir comment obtenir les bonnes informations pour la vente.

de.name: Reagieren auf Kundenbedürfnisse und Einwände
de.coverDescription:
DEMNÄCHST BALD AUF DEUTSCH
To give yourself every chance at getting the sale you need to do your homework. Make sure you know your customer and the product, know what you want to get out of the meeting, and know how to get the right information for the sale.
